credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: Monument
description: Columns with Fortunes on top rise at the corners of a dado. Two sections of round bases stand upon the dado. Over these is another round section with flights of stairs. Dancing girls hold festoons, standing on walls separating the stairs. A domes pavilion rises on top. A statue of a seated man with a high pedestal stands on it. Circle, underneath.
name: Drawing
